text: Rosen Dimitrov Zhelyazkov (born 5 April 1968) is a Bulgarian politician who has been the Prime Minister of Bulgaria since 2025. He is a member of the GERB party. He was Speaker of the National Assembly from 2023 to 2024. He was also a Member of the National Assembly from 2021 to 2025 and Minister of Transport from 2018 to 2021. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Living people Category:1968 births Category:Politicians from Sofia Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria
title: Rosen Zhelyazkov
